name: The Jeweler
body: ![jewkery making](http://i.ytimg.com/vi/T2WwAnfj7YU/maxresdefault.jpg) ### Welcome to The jeweler. We use our expertise to give you high quality and elegant jewelry. ### About the jeweler The company has started in 2009 since the we worked on presenting you with the highest quality jewelry that has ever been made. All of our jewelry are hand made and we have been collaborating with the best designers to turn their designs into art-full pieces ready to be worn. ### contact us you can contact us at nura.g@live.com *Twitter: [@The_jeweler_](https://twitter.com/The_jeweler_) *instagram: [the_jeweler__](https://instagram.com/the_jeweler__/)
